title: Coolutils Outlook Plugin
text:

Every day we offer FREE licensed software you’d have to buy otherwise. $45.00 Giveaway of the day — Coolutils Outlook Plugin Coolutils Outlook Plugin is a unique add-in for your Outlook. User rating: 4 (100%) 0 (0%) Leave a comment 
Coolutils Outlook Plugin is available as a Giveaway of the day! You have limited time to download and install it. Download Now Coolutils Outlook Plugin Terms and conditions 
Coolutils Outlook Plugin is a unique add-in for your Outlook. Save any email as PDF or DOC or TXT file in one click without exporting it first. Add page counters, give new descriptive names, process attachments, add your text or logo, stamp bates numbers – all done in this little add-in. After installation you get a new inlay Convert in your Outlook ribbon. It’s so handy to get a file converter right in Outlook! 
The user with the best improvement idea will get Free license for ProSuiteCoolutils Gold Bundle - 30 converters in one suite!!! System Requirements: 
Windows Vista/7 /8 /8.1 /10 (x32/x64); 35 MB of free space Publisher:
